694096132268490752.text: Since moving to Europe, I've become increasingly vocal about my Asian identity b/c this is where it feels most under threat of being erased.

694095527907057664.text: In Canada, being mixed was normal. This was also where my background was most fetishized, in a way that could be downright creepy.

694094612965822464.text: Growing up in Asia, there was very little room to identify as mixed. People saw me as white, not at all like them. End of story.
